Class Turret

Creature
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Enemy
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Turret
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
public class Turret extends Enemy
The Turret class represents a stationary enemy in the game that can rotate within a limited angle range and detect players using its Vision component.

This class extends

invalid reference 
Creature
and implements
invalid reference 
IUpdateable
, allowing it to perform continuous updates at every tick of the game.

The turret can rotate back and forth between a minimum and maximum angle. If the player is caught, a collision with the Player occurs and the game restarts via GameLogic.restartLevel().

    • playerInLos

      public boolean playerInLos()
      Description copied from class: Enemy
      Determines whether the player is currently within the enemy's line of sight. This base implementation always returns false and should be overridden by subclasses.
      Overrides:
      playerInLos in class Enemy
      Returns:
      false by default, until implemented by child classes
